name: whatson-api
description: What's on? API to retrieve movies and tvshows

scripts.update-packages: ncu -u && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.changed-dataset: git update-index --no-assume-unchanged src/assets/films_ids.txt && git update-index --no-assume-unchanged src/assets/series_ids.txt
scripts.unchanged-dataset: git update-index --assume-unchanged src/assets/films_ids.txt && git update-index --assume-unchanged src/assets/series_ids.txt
scripts.check-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh check_dataset movie && bash src/data/checkIds.sh check_dataset tvshow
scripts.check-dataset-force: bash src/data/checkIds.sh check_dataset movie force && bash src/data/checkIds.sh check_dataset tvshow force
scripts.update-local: bash src/data/getIds.sh local movie && bash src/data/getIds.sh local tvshow
scripts.update-local-stop: bash src/data/getIds.sh local movie stop imdb && bash src/data/getIds.sh local tvshow stop imdb
scripts.update-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh check movie && bash src/data/checkIds.sh check tvshow
scripts.update-active-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh check movie active && bash src/data/checkIds.sh check tvshow active
scripts.confirm-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh update movie && bash src/data/checkIds.sh update tvshow
scripts.push-all-platforms: git push origin main && git push bitbucket main && git push bitbucket_2 main && git push bitbucket_3 main
scripts.push: npm run check-api-version && npm run check-dataset && npm run prettier && npm run test && npm run commit && npm run push-all-platforms && npm run unchanged-dataset
scripts.push-dataset: npm run check-dataset-force && npm run prettier && npm run test && npm run commit && npm run push-all-platforms && npm run unchanged-dataset
scripts.update-movie-data-first-half: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(true));" | xargs -I {} node src/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db circleci no_active no_check_db_ids {} no_check_data no_force mojo check_services no_delete 7
scripts.update-movie-data-second-half: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(false));" | xargs -I {} node src/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db circleci no_active no_check_db_ids {} no_check_data no_force mojo check_services no_delete 7
scripts.update-tvshow-data-all: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(true));" | xargs -I {} node src/updateData.js tvshow no_update_ids update_db circleci no_active no_check_db_ids {} no_check_data no_force mojo check_services no_delete 7
